General.Name: Black Iron Inc.
General.Description: Black Iron Inc. engages in the exploration and development of ferrous metals in Ukraine. It holds a 100% interest in the Shymanivske iron ore project covering an area of 2.56 square kilometers located in Krivyi Rih, Ukraine. The company was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 198 Davenport Road, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5R 1J2
